features: Comfort Height Elongated Toilet bowl - With a seat height comparable to that of a standard chair, Comfort Height toilets make sitting down and standing up easier for people of all ages
10" rough-in, seat and supply lines not included
Class Five(R) - provides tremendous bulk waste flushing performance and best-in-class bowl cleanliness
3-bolt Installation - Three pre-installed tank bolts save installation time
body.description: Product Description Unique kitchen and bath brands to meet your design needs. KOHLER is a recognized global leader in kitchen and bath design. Its diversity of products leads the way in design, craftsmanship and innovation. From the Manufacturer Exceptional Performance. Exceptional Value. Wellworth toilets have been an American benchmark for innovation and performance since 1936. productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #333,015 in Tools & Home Improvement (See Top 100 in Tools & Home Improvement) #120 in Two-Piece Toilets

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 29, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful and functional!
reviews.reviewText: The two packages arrived with expected minor damage on the outside of the box due to it's large size and heavy weight, but the inside was packaged nicely and padded with foams and foam spray so no damage to the toilet. Had to get one with a 10 inch rough in and it fits perfectly. It’s taller, elongated, flushes very quietly and the tank fills rather fast. Happy with the purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 25, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth the money
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Very well packaged to prevent damage. Missing the nuts to hold the toilet down to the floor, easy to install, beautiful and does its work - one flush without fear of clogging

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 8, 2022
reviews.reviewText: We decided to replace our 30 year old commode with a newer taller model and what a difference it makes!.It is a very well made and the height is perfect.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 29, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I was thoroughly surprised at the great job the sender did packing the items
reviews.reviewText: I bought the first one of two from Lowes. I went to buy another and they raised the price over 35 dollars. I got this one at the same original price. At first I hesitated because I was concerned that it might not survive damage due to its size and weight. I was thoroughly surprised at the great job the sender did packing the items. As for the commode itself, it is the best in looks, function and operation. I paired it with a Genie Model EB Bidet and it definitely updated my bathrooms. My wife says the flushing sound was different from the old toilets, I told her the new sound was one of better quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 26, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars THIS IS NOT A POWERFLUSH TOILET!!!
reviews.reviewText: I am very upset. For my bathroom remodeling project, I just spent 3 weeks to identify a Kohler powerflush toilet with a flushmate swish sound to replace my Kohler power flush. This product was misrepresented. It is NOT a power flush. It is NOT a high, handicap toilet. There was not any toilet seat even though the product photo displays a seat. I was tricked.I am pissed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 13, 2022
reviews.reviewText: It came very well packaged however there was a piece of chipped porcelain next to the flush handle that was placed inside the tank. Out of sight so we kept it otherwise happy with the early delivery and overall product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 20, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars You'll be flushing more than once!
reviews.reviewText: 6-26-2018 You have to see the entry from the Kohler customer service rep. to know why it changed from a one star to a five star review!!It looks like I'm the only one who thinks this toilet should go back to the design board. First of all, they went from 1.6 to a 1.2 gallon flush. It's become a spritz flush. The design of the toilet has solid waste deposited on the porcelain portion of the bowl, just before the water. The flush is adequate if all waste matter ends up in the water, but since human beings are shaped differently than horses, it doesn't. It then takes multiple flushes to clean the bowl because there is not enough water to rinse the inside of the bowl. The 1.2 gallons are 95% directed to an immediate flush and not bowl rinse. Bad design. Buy one and you'll know what I'm talking about. Be forewarned. Don't buy this toilet or any 1.2 gallon spritz flush design for that matter!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 4, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars No toilet seat though shown with one in the picture of item
reviews.reviewText: You can get many Kohler toilets in the $200 to $250 dollar range but I needed a 10 inch rough in which are hard to find. For over $400 You would think it would come with a seat like most do, especially if they are going to have a seat on the toilet in the item photo. Also does not come with wax ring or installation bolts. Customer service told me it was supposed to come with bolts and shipped me the caps that go over the bolts instead. After several days of back and forth communications, she finally decided that the bolts don't come with the tiolet and I would have to purchase some. Nice toilet, but should come with everything all the toilets at the big box stores come with, and picture should be updated to just show a bowl and tank because that is all you get.
Nice looking toiletHard to find a good 10 inch roughed in
